encyclopedia.content: 名词n. 1.公报[C] issue a 发表公报 1. As spelled out in the communique, the two countries agreed to expand their trade relations in the coming year. 正如公报中所说，两国同意在未来的一年中扩大两国之间的贸易关系。 2. A government communique, issued this morning, states that ... 今晨发布的政府公报宣称 ...
